transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha boliye
Executive: Ji good evening Faisal ji se baat ho rahi hai
Customer: Nahi kya baat hai
Executive: Bhumesh samil mein baat ho rahi hai na
Customer: Ha Bhumesh samil
Executive: Pankaj baat kar raha hu sir Indiamart head office se relationship manager se aapka sir abhi just ek feedback receive hua tha mujhe ki aapke account manager Vinit ji se aapki baat hui aur aap satisfied nahi hue wo discussion pe to wohi janne ke liye maine call kiya tha ki kya discussion hua aur kahan pe aap satisfied nahi hue kis reason se nahi hue aap kya problem hai issue hai jo resolve nahi karwa paye aapke account manager se
Customer: Mere abhi thoda busy hai call kijiye
Executive: Nahi waise baat aap hi se hui thi ya kisi aur se hui thi unki
Customer: Faisal bhai se hui thi
Executive: Okay okay to fir abhi unse kab baat ho payegi sir
Customer: Subah subah kam ho jayega
Executive: Haan ji sir
Customer: Subah subah
Executive: Morning mein ho payegi unse baat
Customer: Haan
Executive: Possible nahi hai sir ki abhi kuch aadha ghante mein ek ghante mein connect kar le unse
Customer: Aapka naam kya bola agar wo free hote hai to
Executive: Aapka naam kya bola
Executive: Pankaj
Customer: Ek hi minute chahiye tha sir waise to unka malum nahi unhone kyu not satisfied kiya hai unko diya hai aapke unke account manager ko
Executive: To abhi paas hi mein hai kya aapke sir
Customer: Ha ek minute
Executive: Ek minute ha bas unka lunga bas aap baat karwa dijiye
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji good evening sir kaise hain
Customer: Good evening sir ache hain boliye
Executive: Ji ji Pankaj baat kar raha hu Indiamart head office se relationship manager sir aapka na aapke account manager Vinit se discussion hua hoga aaj kuch services ko lekar ke us pe hamara aapka feedback receive hume jo hua hai not satisfied ka hua hai sir us pe ki aap jo bhi unhone bataya aapko satisfied nahi nahi un log unhone to mere ko call kiya tha maine dusra call mein call karne ke liye bola
Executive: Theek hai
Customer: Unhone call karne ke time kuch call connect nahi hua to mere ko iska service request aaya tha isliye maine usko galat tarike se message type ho gaya usme bas itna hi hai
Executive: Aapka galti se waha pe not satisfied ho gaya waha pe
Customer: Not satisfied ho gaya
Executive: Okay wo actually jo rating hota hai na sir ye hamare employees ke liye hota hai aur unke liye actually negative mein chala gaya aapka rating to basically aap keh rahe hain ki galti se click ha koi nahi nahi koi issue nahi hai main baat kar lunga unse aur abhi aapka kyuki ye fir se concern raise ho gaya kyuki aapne not satisfied kiya tha to abhi main dobara se kyuki complaint raise ho gaya sir maine isliye call kiya ki aapka complaint to raise ho gaya not satisfied ke liye hai na to main isko fir se close kar de raha hu ab aapke pass fir se mail jayega abhi mail ke pass mail ke through jayega ki aap mere se baat karke abhi satisfied hue humne resolve kiya aapka jo bhi complaint kyuki system to wohi lega complaint mein le raha hai isko hai na to please waha pe aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega aur comments mein dal dijiyega mistakenly aapne waha pe not satisfied kar diya tha aur isi wajah se wo complaint raise ho gaya Vinit Vinit ke aage isme theek hai aur kuch problem issue hota hai to aap Vinit ko connect kar lijiyega sir
Customer: Theek hai sir
Executive: Theek hai okay thank you sir thank you so much for your time sir
Customer: Thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was marked as 'not satisfied'.

- Customer mistakenly marked 'not satisfied'.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the 'not satisfied' feedback.

- Executive will close the complaint.

- Customer agreed to mark as satisfied in mail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, not satisfied, resolution, complaint
